inclusion.criterion: Dr. Jamal Mourad or Dr. Nichole Mahnert will be performing hysterectomy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: study-related costs are paid for, all study-related procedures/tests must be conducted at a Banner Health facility
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and vomiting. She has several gallstones and biliary sludge.
